GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Let's go, Niko. I hope the good mixologist is on tonight.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~走吧，Niko。希望今天是那个技术好的调酒师当班。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I expected you to come in a car.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我还以为你会开车过来。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Well, it's an improvement on the last thing you were driving.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~好吧，这车总比你上次开的那玩意要好。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~This obsession with really shit cars is really taking shabby chic to its limits Niko.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~你对这种破烂车的痴迷程度已经用古董风格都解释不了了

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I want new experiences, I want to see things that I haven't seen before.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我想要新的体验，我想见识以前没见过的东西。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Niko, Hi. How are we going to get around?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~Niko，嗨。这是要怎么出行？

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Oh, an English comic? How quaint and European.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~噢，英文喜剧？有够稀奇，有够欧洲。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_CLUB_GENERIC
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_CLUB_GENERIC

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Excuse me if I'm not jumping for joy that we're playing parts again.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~很抱歉，做这种意料中的事情可不会让我惊喜。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I'm surprised that you think an intellectual such as myself would be interested in playing darts again.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~你居然会觉得我这样的才女会对再玩一次飞镖感兴趣？

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Niko, please get a new car. I'm embarrassed to be seen in this thing.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~Niko，拜托你去弄辆新车。我坐这玩意里被别人看见很没面子的。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_FASTFOOD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_FASTFOOD

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~If I didn't know any better, I'd have thought you were trying to get me drunk.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~要不是因为我很懂，我就会以为你是想灌醉我了。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I gave my first blowjob in a restroom at this place.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我第一次给人口就是在这里的厕所。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_CAR_OKAY
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_CAR_OKAY

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Okay, let's play pool again. I feel like I've died and woken up in the Midwest.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~好吧，那就再打一次台球吧。我感觉自己像是死了以后又在中西部醒来。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_DARTS_BEFORE
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_DARTS_BEFORE

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Well at least this car is better than your old one.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~好吧，至少这辆车比之前那辆好点。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Umm, Niko. All the shows started a while ago.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~唔，Niko。这些表演早些时候就开始了。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Or something, I guess. I don't think about clothes much.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~怪人之外吧，大概。我对衣服不大上心。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_TORSO_GOOD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_TORSO_GOOD

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~You're still driving this? I guess you aren't moving up in the world.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~还在开这玩意？那你应该是没能再上一层楼了。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~They love me at this place. I swear, you spend enough money and people forget that you threw up on the manager.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~这地方的人很喜欢我。我发誓，只要花的钱够多，别人就会忘记你把店经理给甩了。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_SHOW_CABARET
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_SHOW_CABARET

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Okay, if we're not going to do anything you can just take me home.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~好吧，要是没别的安排，你就送我回家吧。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~God, you know. I'll try anything once. I tried picking up guys on craplist, didn't I?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~天，你也知道，我什么都会试一试。我不就试着在craplist上约了人吗？

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Okay, I did not realize you were this... um... earthy. Do they still make clothes like that?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~好吧，没想到你会这么...土。这年头还有人做这种衣服？

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Alex Chilton does not take the bus. Please tell me that your car is around the corner.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~Alex Chilton不坐公交，麻烦告诉我你的车就停在附近。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Ahh, I see you've tried to save some money on the top half of your outfit.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~啊，看得出来，你想在自己的衣服上多省点钱。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_INTRO
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_INTRO

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_STANDARD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_STANDARD

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_POOL_LAST
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_POOL_LAST

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_LEGS_GOOD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_LEGS_GOOD

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~So tell me, what are you into?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~跟我讲讲吧，你有什么兴趣吗？

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I hate tardiness. Come on, let's go.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我讨厌别人迟到。好了，快走吧。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_CLOTHES_UNUSUAL
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_CLOTHES_UNUSUAL

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Shit, you're actually who you said you were. I was expecting a two-foot lesbian. I'm Alex.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我靠，你这人居然描述与实物相符啊。我还以为来的会是一个61厘米高的女同性恋。我是Alex。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Niko, I thought a resourceful guy like you would be able to get hold of a better car than this.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~Niko，你这么有本事，我还以为你开的车能比现在这辆好呢。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Well this is the place, Niko. I wonder who we'll see.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~好了，到地方了，Niko。不知道我们会遇见谁。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_CAR_NEW_BAD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_CAR_NEW_BAD

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~We're playing pool, eh? Are you going to make me chug brewskies and chant as well?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我们是去打台球，对吧？还是说你想顺便带我去喝酒唱歌呢？

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_SAME_BAD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_SAME_BAD

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~It gets where it's meant to go.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~平时开着也不会掉链子。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~This guy is like, seriously urban. I'm told he's like, very now.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~这人就是，很社会。之前刚有人跟我说他的品行。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_ARRIVEC_NOTLATE
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_ARRIVEC_NOTLATE

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I'm getting used to those clothes you're wearing.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我都快习惯你穿着的这身衣服了。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Do you think that anyone in Liberty City in the twenty-first century really eats this type of food? Yuk.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~21世纪的自由城还会有人吃这种东西吗？呕。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_NOGLASS_BAD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_NOGLASS_BAD

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~This is perfect, Niko. I'm an intellectual and I'm cultured so I really enjoy this.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~太完美了，Niko。我既有才华又有教养，真的很能享受这个。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_LEGS_BAD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_LEGS_BAD

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_DARTS_NOT
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_DARTS_NOT

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_STRIP_NOT
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_STRIP_NOT

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~What's this obsession with strip clubs, Niko? Aren't I enough for you?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~你就这么喜欢脱衣舞俱乐部吗，Niko？有我在你还嫌不够吗？

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Let's go and hit some balls into holes with long sticks. Oh what fun.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~那我们就去用长长的棒子把球打到洞里吧。哦，真有趣。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_NOGLASS_GOOD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_NOGLASS_GOOD

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_NOHAT_GOOD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_NOHAT_GOOD

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~You're taking me to play darts twice in a row. You're real imaginative, aren't you Niko?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~你又带我去玩飞镖啊。真是鬼才策划，不是吗Niko？

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_CLOTHES_BAD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_CLOTHES_BAD

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_HINT
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_HINT

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Well, if that's your only nice outfit you may as well get the most out of it.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~好吧，要是那是你唯一一件的好外套，倒是该物尽其用。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~It's a shame you're not wearing that hat any more. I found out how much it cost.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~你没有再戴那顶帽子真可惜。我刚知道它的价格。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I'm a white chick but I'm really into street culture and the urban scene. I think I'll really like this.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我是一个白人女孩，但我已经融入了街头文化和都市生活。我大概会喜欢这个的。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_ARRIVEF_NOTLATE
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_ARRIVEF_NOTLATE

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~They do where I am from.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我老家那边还在做。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_CAR_BIKEX
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_CAR_BIKEX

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_SHOW_K_WILL
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_SHOW_K_WILL

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Let's go my mysterious European.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~走吧，我的神秘欧洲人。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_SAME_GOOD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_SAME_GOOD

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_CLOTHES_UNUSAL
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_CLOTHES_UNUSAL

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I did not want to make carbon footprint. We'll be fine.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我不想产生碳足迹。不要紧的。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_CAR_SAME_GOOD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_CAR_SAME_GOOD

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Can you please explain to me what the appeal of really shit cars is? I don't get it.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~麻烦你告诉我这辆破铜烂铁有什么好的？我是真搞不懂。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I think I preferred what you were wearing last time.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我还是更喜欢你上次的那套衣服。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Hey, Niko. Is this like an off, off, off, off Burlesque show?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~嘿，Niko。这是不是那种、那种、那种、那种要脱衣服的表演？

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I like your pants, darling. Nice.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我喜欢你的裤子，亲爱的。很好看。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_FEET_GOOD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_FEET_GOOD

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Okay, let's eat here. It's not exactly going to be a gastronomic rollercoaster though, is it?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~好吧，在这儿吃吧。这里应该不是那种传送带餐厅吧？

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Thanks.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~谢谢。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Hey Niko, do you mind if we do something else?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~嘿，Niko，你介意我们再做点别的吗？

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~What a transformation, thank God you got rid of those glasses.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~大变样啊，谢天谢地你终于把那副眼镜扔了。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Well Niko, if people are going to see you in the same set of clothes repeatedly, they may as well be fashionable ones.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~好吧Niko，就算每次都穿同一套衣服，也麻烦你穿当季流行款。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~So you didn't dress up for the first date. Why would you?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~你连初次约会都没有好好打扮。怎么想的？

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~You want to play darts... again? Well this is really a hobby of yours, isn't it, Niko?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~你又想玩飞镖...？这个是你的个人爱好是吧，Niko？

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I am so pleased you got rid of that hat, please say you burned it.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~很高兴你终于把那帽子扔了，你已经把那玩意烧了吧。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I'm sick of this shit. I'm getting home myself. I'll see you around, Niko.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我受够了，我自己回家了。回头见，Niko。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I'm glad you're still driving this thing.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~你开的还是这辆车我很高兴。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_CLOTHES_BAD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_CLOTHES_BAD

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Okay, where's your car?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~好了，你的车在哪儿？

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~What the fuck is this? I guess I'm about to find out.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~这他妈是啥？我大概马上就知道了。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_POOL_NOT
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_POOL_NOT

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_CAR_NONE
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_CAR_NONE

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Thank God you've got rid of that thing you were driving before. I mean anything would be better than that.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~谢天谢地你终于不开那辆垃圾了。开啥都比那辆垃圾好。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~When I last met you I got the impression that you had a good dress sense.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~上次遇见你的时候，你的打扮还算有品味。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~No, people drive them here as well. Just not people who live in Middle Park East.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~不，这里人也会开这车，只是住在中心公园东的人不开而已。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_CAR_OKAY
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_CAR_OKAY

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~It's so good that that hat is gone. It made you look like a thug.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~没戴那顶帽子真是太好了，那顶帽子让你像一个小混混。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_CAR_NONE_AB
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_CAR_NONE_AB

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_CLOTHES_GOOD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_CLOTHES_GOOD

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Okay, those are some pretty bold choices. Are you hoping to come across as an eccentric or something?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~好吧，这套搭配有点大胆。你是想做个怪人之类的吗？

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_HAT_GOOD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_HAT_GOOD

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Umm, well you've got to be hungry to eat in a place like this. It hasn't even got a Liberty Tree rosette.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~你一定是饿疯了才会来这里吃饭，这店连Liberty Tree认证都没有。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I didn't think anything could be worse than the car you used to drive, I was wrong.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我还以为你上次开的车已经够差了，没想到还有更差的。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Uhh, this isn't going to work out. Can we do something else?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~呃，这个不太行啊。能不能换个别的？

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_PUB_GENERIC
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_PUB_GENERIC

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~If I'd known you weren't bringing a car I would have gotten Daddy to lend us a driver.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~早知道你没把车开过来，我就让爹地给我们派个司机了。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_STRIP_LAST
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_STRIP_LAST

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_POOL_BEFORE
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_POOL_BEFORE

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Okay, that's it. I'm going to make my own way home.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~好了，就这样吧。我自己回家了。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Hi, I'm Niko. You must be the Liberated Woman. We met on craplist.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~嗨，我是Niko。你就是自由女性吧，我们在craplist上认识的。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Oh, I miss that hat of yours. It gave you an air of mystery.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~噢，我很怀念你那顶帽子，能给你营造神秘感。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I miss those glasses you used to wear. They gave you some class.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我很怀念你那副眼镜，显得你有地位。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Oh, I guess that you feel comfortable in these clothes. Well, at least they're not disgusting.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~噢，这身衣服你穿着大概还很舒服吧。好吧，至少还不算恶心。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Hey, Niko. I hope you aren't planning on carrying me on this date.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~嘿，Niko。你不会打算背着我去约会吧？

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_CAR_BIKE
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_CAR_BIKE

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Ooh, it is so nice to be driven around in a car you're used to, don't you think?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~喔，乘着坐习惯了的车四处转悠真好，你不觉得吗？

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Can't we do something else instead?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我们就不能弄点别的事做吗？

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I'm pleased you've kept this car. Daddy gets rid of nice cars after driving them for a couple of weeks.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~很高兴你的这辆车还在。爹地的话好好的车没开几周就不要了。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~It's so nice to be able to properly see your face without those cheap glasses on.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~终于能不被那副廉价眼镜挡着，好好看看你的脸了。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_CAR_BAD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_CAR_BAD

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Niko, can't you go for a more preppy look? That hat makes you look like a criminal.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~Niko，你就不能打扮的正经点吗？那顶帽子让你看起来像个罪犯。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~You really need help in the fashion department, Niko.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~你真的得学一学怎么打扮了，Niko。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~What aren't I into? I'm just a Liberty city girl. I like shopping, lunches with the girls, cocktails.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我能有什么兴趣？我就是个普通的自由城女孩，喜欢购物、和闺蜜一起吃饭还有鸡尾酒。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_TORSO_BAD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_TORSO_BAD

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I like this car, I'm getting used to being driven in it.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我喜欢这辆车，我都快习惯坐这车兜风了。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Hey mysterious European, let's go.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~嘿，神秘欧洲人，我们走吧。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~It's a shame you got rid of those glasses, they made you look sophisticated.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~你不戴那副眼镜真是可惜，那副眼镜能让你看起来老成点。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~So, you take the whole "If it ain't broke, don't fix it." attitude to getting dressed then?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~那个，你选衣服是按「缝缝补补又三年」的标准来选的吗？

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Your ass is giving mine a run for its money in those pants.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~穿着这条裤子，你的屁股都快性感过我了。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_ARRIVEF_LATE
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_ARRIVEF_LATE

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~The good thing about you seeing all these strippers is you'll realize how much better my body is.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~看一些脱衣舞女也有好处，这样你就知道我的身材到底有多好了。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_BORED_TAKEHOME
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_BORED_TAKEHOME

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Pool, Niko? Were you in a frat house or something? What next? Keg stands?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~台球吗，Niko？你当这是开大学生联谊会还是什么？接下来是什么？铁桶倒立？

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Oh God, I hope none of my friends sees me out with a man dressed like this.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~天哪，希望不会被朋友看见我和穿成这样的男人在一起。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_FEET_BAD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_FEET_BAD

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I'll explain anything to you that you don't get afterwards.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~你没听懂的部分之后我会给你解释的。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I like those shoes, very smart.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我喜欢这双鞋，很时髦。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I liked those clothes the last time you wore them.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~上次你穿这套衣服的时候我就很喜欢。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I write a blog. It's Liberated Woman on blogsnobs.org.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我还开了个博客，就是blogsnobs.org上的自由女性。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I can get down with strippers. I can get into this. Let's go.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我可以顶住脱衣舞女的，我可以把持住的。走吧。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~If you want to take me to a show, Niko. I'd check what time they started.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~要是你想带我去看表演，Niko，我建议你还是先确定下几点开演。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_BORED_LEAVING
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_BORED_LEAVING

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~This car is alright, I think we bought my maid one.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~这车还可以，跟我家女仆的配车同款。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Alright, change of plan. Take me somewhere else.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~好吧，计划有变。带我去别的地方。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~You're dating an intellectual girl, maybe she's into things that are more cerebral than playing pool.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~和你约会的是个才女，她想做的可能是比打台球更需要智力的事情。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Okay, you sell one crap car and you buy another. When did that ever make sense?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~好吧，你这是刚卖了一辆破车就又买了一辆。怎么还有这种操作的？

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~You look pretty good, Niko. Is that this season's collection?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~你看上去很棒，Niko。这身行头是当季潮流款吗？

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_CLOTHES_GOOD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_CLOTHES_GOOD

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I remember going to the opening party of this place, it was wild.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我还记得来这儿参加开业典礼的情景，当时很放荡。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_NOHAT_BAD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_NOHAT_BAD

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Niko, you have got to learn you get what you pay for and you didn't pay much for those pants.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~Niko，你一定要明白自己买的是什么东西，这条裤子一看就没花多少钱。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_CAR_SAME_BAD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_CAR_SAME_BAD

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_LATE
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_LATE

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_HAT_BAD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_HAT_BAD

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Nice, car. I got one of those for my sweet sixteen.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~车子不错。我十六岁生日的时候就有了一辆。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Yeah, I'd be surprised if they let you into any clubs wearing those shoes.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~对，穿着这种鞋还有俱乐部肯放你进去的话，我就要大吃一惊了。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~If anything, that hat looks expensive, which is so in.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~硬要说的话，帽子看起来挺贵的，戴着很有型。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Darts, how quaint, Niko.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~飞镖，古怪的选择，Niko。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_CLUB_FAVOURITE
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_CLUB_FAVOURITE

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Most guys I know trade up their cars whenever they can. It's good that you're holding on to this one.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我认识的大多数人都会尽量换上更好的车。你也这么做是件好事。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Look, if you're only going to pick me up in crap cars, I'll get Daddy's chauffeur to drive us.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~听着，要是你只能开这种垃圾车来接我，我就要让爹地的司机开车送我们了。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I've said it before, Niko, but I like your car.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我之前也说过，Niko，但我喜欢你的车。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_INTRO
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_INTRO

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Ohh, take me where you wanna take me biker boy.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~哦，想带我去哪儿就去哪儿吧，摩托小子。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~What happened to your face? It's those cheap glasses.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~你脸上是怎么回事？便宜货眼镜不太行。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Eww, never wear those glasses again. They just scream bargain bucket.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~嗷，别戴这副眼镜了。只会让你掉价。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_GLASSHAT_GOOD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_GLASSHAT_GOOD

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_CLOTHES_OKAY
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_CLOTHES_OKAY

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_STRIP_BEFORE
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_STRIP_BEFORE

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Those glasses give you a good vibe, Niko.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~这副眼镜让你很有气质，Niko。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~You're on foot. Are we taking a taxi or walking?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~你是走来的，那我们是要打的还是走路过去？

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~You're chest looks really cut in what you're wearing.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~你这身衣服很显胸肌。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_CAR_NONE_AA
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_CAR_NONE_AA

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_DARTS_LAST
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_DARTS_LAST

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Well, getting rid of that old car was the first step toward self-improvement. Well done, Niko.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~很好，换掉那辆旧车是你提升自我的第一步。干得好，Niko。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~You really do like cheap cars, don't you Niko?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~你怎么就那么喜欢这种便宜车呢，Niko？

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Oh, darts. This is a real working man's pastime, isn't it.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~噢，飞镖。这个完全是打工仔的业余消遣吧？

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Yeah, well maybe you should have done more than buy coke off drug dealers since then?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~行吧，估计之后你做的应该不止是问那个毒贩子买可卡因吧？

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_CAR_BAD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_CAR_BAD

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Uhh, Niko. I was starting to think I'd been stood up. Umm, I'm not walking by the way.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~呃，Niko。我差点就以为自己被鸽了。唔，要我走着去是不可能的。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I'm digging those glasses.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我很中意这副眼镜。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Niko, are you trying to lubricate me with liquor before making a move?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~Niko，你是想在动作戏前先用酒给我润滑一下吗？

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I actually really enjoyed it the last time we came to a strip club. I picked up some moves.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~其实上次去脱衣舞俱乐部的时候我也乐在其中。我还学了几招。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~God, are those shoes fashionable back in Europe? You must be so behind the Liberty City trends.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~天哪，这鞋不会还是欧洲流行款吧？你这人完全跟不上自由城的时尚潮流。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Okay, well you've wasted my time by being late. Don't waste my time getting me where we're going.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~好了，迟到已经浪费了我的时间，就不要在路途上多耽搁了。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~This is getting boring. I thought we were meant to be on a date? Can you take me home?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~实在太无聊了，我们不是出来约会的吗？能送我回家吗？

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Ooh, it is so nice to be taken in a car that isn't a death trap. Thanks for trading up, Niko.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~能乘上一辆不是死亡陷阱的车真是好事。感谢你换了辆好车，Niko。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~God, this place really reminds me of being underage.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~上帝，这地方会让我想起我还没成年的时候。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_GLASSHAT_BAD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_GLASSHAT_BAD

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Those shoes are nice, I might get some for Daddy.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~这双鞋很不错，我可以给爹地弄一双。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~It was brave of you to come out in these pants, Niko.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~穿着这种裤子还敢出门，你真是胆大，Niko。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~The way I think about it, even if I hate something, I can write a blog about it.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我的想法就是，即便我讨厌某些东西，我还是能为它写篇博客。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_CLOTHES_OKAY
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_CLOTHES_OKAY

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~This car is unreal, I thought they only drove cars like this in the third world.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~这车是假的吧，我还以为只有第三世界才会开这种车。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~These bikes really take me back. Well let's get going, Niko.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~摩托车能让我想起很多往日时光。好了，我们走吧，Niko。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~My girlfriend dated the head chef here, he was really fussy.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我闺蜜约过这里的主厨，他真的很挑剔。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~It was a sad day when the bouncer stopped asking me for ID at this place.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~这里的门卫不再问我要通行证就放我进去的那天是个悲伤的日子。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_ARRIVEM_NOTLATE
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_ARRIVEM_NOTLATE

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_HIGHEND
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_HIGHEND

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Wow, back at the strip club, are we? Well you must have really liked the effect it had on me last time.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~哇哦，重返脱衣舞俱乐部，对吧？你肯定是喜欢上次我去了这里后的样子。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_DIFF_ACTIVITY_NO
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_DIFF_ACTIVITY_NO

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Sweetie, I think it's time to get a new car, like, ten years ago.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~宝贝，我想是时候换辆新车了，就像，十年前一样。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I don't normally like hats, but that one works for you.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~通常我不喜欢帽子，但你这顶很合适。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_HINT
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_HINT

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I guess you're having your other clothes washed. I mean, there can't be any other reason to be wearing these.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~你的衣服是不是都拿去洗了？除此以外，我也想不到别的穿现在这身的理由了。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I don't like waiting Niko. Let's just go.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我不喜欢等待，Niko。我们走吧。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Okay, tell me how we're getting where we're going because I don't see a car.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~好吧，快告诉我我们怎么过去，我连你的车都没看见。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~You were probably expecting some freak was going to kidnap you, right?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~你是不是觉得穿太好会被绑架，对吧？

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Niko, I've been waiting. No fucking wonder when you haven't brought a car.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~Niko，我等很久了。你丫连车都没开来，难怪这么慢。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~A motorbike? I haven't been on one of these since I dated a drug dealer in high school.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~摩托车？自从在高中约上了一个毒贩子后我就再也没乘过。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Shit, if I see another fucking pool table I'll scream.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我靠，再让我见着傻逼台球桌我就要叫出来了。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Well if I'd known that you didn't have a car I'd have got the chauffeur.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~要是我早点知道你没有车，我就先把司机叫来了。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I only really dress up when I have to.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我只会在必要的时候好好打扮。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Darling, with clothes as with everything else, you buy cheap, you buy twice. I think you'll be trading in your top.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~亲爱的，衣服什么的都一样，一分钱一分货。你该换一件上衣了。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_SHOW_LATE
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_SHOW_LATE

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_CAR_NEW_GOOD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_CAR_NEW_GOOD

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_PAL_CAR_GOOD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_PAL_CAR_GOOD

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I'm the only person who's allowed to be late, Niko. You're making me sound like my mother. Just drive.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我是唯一一个可以迟到的人，Niko。你这样搞得我说话都像我母亲了。开车吧。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Okay, well you're moving up the ladder in terms of cars. You're moving slowly but you're moving.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~好吧，你现在在汽车方面步步高升了。虽然升得很慢，但也在上升。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Hey Niko. Let's go.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~嘿，Niko。我们走。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Yeah, don't worry Niko. I mean we all make fashion mistakes.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~没事，别担心，Niko。毕竟大家都会在穿搭上出错。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Niko, I don't care how long you've had this car but I hate it.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~Niko，我才不管你和这车已经在一起几年了，我很讨厌它。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_CAR_GOOD
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_CAR_GOOD

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~I'm an intellectual, Niko. I like the finer things like culture and cocktails and gourmet food.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我是个才女，Niko。我喜欢文化、鸡尾酒和美食之类的精致东西。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Well okay, the top half of your outfit is really working for me.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~好吧，你的上衣外套对我很有吸引力。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Okay, there's a reason why trendy people don't wear hats.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~我说，时尚界人士不戴帽子是有原因的。

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_CAR_BIKE
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_CAR_BIKE

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Oh, Niko. It's sweet that you're attached to this car but it really is disgusting.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~噢，Niko。你这么爱这辆车确实感人，但这样真的很恶心。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Uhh, thanks.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~呃，谢了。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Well I guess this is a walking date.
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~行吧，这次约会大概是要走着去了。

GCA2AUD.original: ~z~Niko, I'm starting to worry about you. Do you only want to look at naked women?
GCA2AUD.translated: ~z~Niko，我都要替你担心了。你是不是只想看裸体的女人？

GCA2AUD.original: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_SHOW_RGERV
GCA2AUD.translated: GCA_ACT_ARRIVE_SHOW_RGERV
